00030 /**
00031  * Color utilities class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Color_Utils
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The color method to use (RGB, HSL or HSV)
00042      */
00043     protected $_colorMethod = 'RGB';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     public function setColorMethod( $method )
00049     {
00050         // Converts the method to uppercase
00051         $method = strtoupper( $method );
00052         
00053         // Checks the color method
00054         switch( $method ) {
00055             
00056             // Hue Saturation Value
00057             case 'HSV':
00058                 
00059                 $this->_colorMethod = 'HSV';
00060                 break;
00061             
00062             // Hue Saturation Luminosity
00063             case 'HSL':
00064                 
00065                 $this->_colorMethod = 'HSL';
00066                 break;
00067             
00068             // Default - Red Green Blue
00069             default:
00070                 
00071                 $this->_colorMethod = 'RGB';
00072                 break;
00073         }
00074     }

00076     /**
00077      * Creates an hexadecimal color
00078      * 
00079      * This method is used to create an hexadecimal color representation from
00080      * RGB (Red-Green-Blue), HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) or HSV
00081      * (Hue-Saturation-Value) values.
00082      * 
00083      * @param   number  The first value (red or hue, depending of the method)
00084      * @param   number  The second value (green or saturation, depending of the method)
00085      * @param   number  The third value (blue, luminosity or value, depending of the method)
00086      * @param   boolean Return value in uppercase
00087      * @return  string  The hexadecimal value of the color
00088      */
00089     public function createHexColor( $v1, $v2, $v3, $uppercase = false )
00090     {
00091         // Check color creation method
00092         if( $this->_colorMethod === 'HSL' ) {
00093             
00094             // Convert colors
00095             $colors = tx_oop_Color_Converter::hslToRgb( $v1, $v2, $v3 );
00096             
00097             // Set converted values
00098             $v1 = $colors[ 'R' ];
00099             $v2 = $colors[ 'G' ];
00100             $v3 = $colors[ 'B' ];
00101             
00102         } elseif( $this->_colorMethod === 'HSV' ) {
00103             
00104             // Convert colors
00105             $colors = tx_oop_Color_Converter::hsvToRgb( $v1, $v2, $v3 );
00106             
00107             // Set converted values
00108             $v1 = $colors[ 'R' ];
00109             $v2 = $colors[ 'G' ];
00110             $v3 = $colors[ 'B' ];
00111         }
00112         
00113         // Convert each color into hexadecimal
00114         $R = dechex( tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $v1, 0, 255 ) );
00115         $G = dechex( tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $v2, 0, 255 ) );
00116         $B = dechex( tx_oop_Number_Utils::inRange( $v3, 0, 255 ) );
00117         
00118         // Complete each color if needed
00119         $R = ( strlen( $R ) === 1 ) ? '0' . $R : $R;
00120         $G = ( strlen( $G ) === 1 ) ? '0' . $G : $G;
00121         $B = ( strlen( $B ) === 1 ) ? '0' . $B : $B;
00122         
00123         // Create full hexadecimal color
00124         $color =  $R . $G . $B;
00125         
00126         // Upper or lower case
00127         $color = ( $uppercase ) ? strtoupper( $color ) : strtolower( $color );
00128         
00129         // Return color
00130         return '#' . $color;
00131     }

00133     /**
00134      * Modifies an hexadecimal color
00135      * 
00136      * This method is used to modify an hexadecimal color representation by
00137      * adding RGB (Red-Green-Blue), HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) or HSV
00138      * (Hue-Saturation-Value) values.
00139      * 
00140      * @param   string  The original color (hexadecimal)
00141      * @param   number  The first value (red or hue, depending of the method)
00142      * @param   number  The second value (green or saturation, depending of the method)
00143      * @param   number  The third value (blue, luminosity or value, depending of the method)
00144      * @param   boolean Return value in uppercase
00145      * @return  string  The hexadecimal value of the modified color
00146      */
00147     public function modifyHexColor( $color, $v1, $v2, $v3, $uppercase = false )
00148     {
00149         // Erase the # character if present
00150         $color = ( substr( $color, 0, 1 ) === '#' ) ? substr( $color, 1, strlen( $color ) ) : $color;
00151         
00152         // Check color length (3 or 6)
00153         if( strlen( $color ) === 3 ) {
00154             
00155             // Extract RGB values from the hexadecimal color
00156             $R = hexdec( substr( $color, 0, 1 ) );
00157             $G = hexdec( substr( $color, 1, 1 ) );
00158             $B = hexdec( substr( $color, 2, 1 ) );
00159             
00160         } elseif( strlen( $color ) === 6 ) {
00161             
00162             // Extract RGB values from the hexadecimal color
00163             $R = hexdec( substr( $color, 0, 2 ) );
00164             $G = hexdec( substr( $color, 2, 2 ) );
00165             $B = hexdec( substr( $color, 4, 2 ) );
00166         }
00167         
00168         // Check modification method
00169         if( $this->_colorMethod === 'HSL' ) {
00170             
00171             // Convert colors
00172             $colors = tx_oop_Color_Converter::rgbToHsl( $R, $G, $B );
00173             
00174             // Create modified color
00175             return $this->createHexColor(
00176                 $colors[ 'H' ] + $v1,
00177                 $colors[ 'S' ] + $v2,
00178                 $colors[ 'L' ] + $v3,
00179                 'HSL',
00180                 $uppercase
00181             );
00182             
00183         } elseif( $this->_colorMethod === 'HSV' ) {
00184             
00185             // Convert colors
00186             $colors = tx_oop_Color_Converter::rgbToHsv( $R,$G,$B );
00187             
00188             // Create modified color
00189             return $this->createHexColor(
00190                 $colors[ 'H' ] + $v1,
00191                 $colors[ 'S' ] + $v2,
00192                 $colors[ 'V' ] + $v3,
00193                 'HSV',
00194                 $uppercase
00195             );
00196             
00197         } else {
00198             
00199             // Create modified color
00200             return $this->createHexColor(
00201                 $R + $v1,
00202                 $G + $v2,
00203                 $B + $v3,
00204                 'RGB',
00205                 $uppercase
00206             );
00207         }
00208     }
